1: <pb/><e>Tna'j Dios David tej tten tuj toy' pic</e> <pb/><t>Tuc'il tk'ajk'ajel nwi'ye cyuwxix in chin jaw sch'ine ti'j Kman, tuc'il tk'ajk'ajel nwi'ye cyuwxix in xi nkanine tu'n ttzaj k'ak'an tc'u'j wi'je.</t>
2: <t>In xi nma'ne nbise te, in xi nma'ne ju yajbil weye te,</t>
3: <t>oc in tzaj baj nc'u'je tuj bis. <pb/>Nman, ojtzki'n tu'na aju in bant wu'ne. Ma cub cyk'on jun c'obil tuj be jatum in chin bete.</t>
4: <t>Que'yintza tuj nbank'abe, mi jun in tzaj onil weye. Mi a'l jun in colin wi'je. Mi a'l jun in ximan wi'je.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Nman, in chin cubsane twitza ex in xi nma'ne teya cyja': Tuc'ila in pon nclon wibe; ex ic ttena te weye tzalu twitz tx'otx' ic tza'n wetzbile.</t>
6: <t>Bintza oc njaw sch'ine porque minti' wipune. Chin tcloma cywitz keju in che yajlan weye, porque at mas cyipun nwitze.</t>
7: <t>Chin ti'mexa tuj presbil weye tu'ntzun tjaw nnimsa'ne. Keju tz'aklxix cbajel cytxolban cyib wi'jele oc tbinchanteya ba'n weye.</t>
